xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/754550-Burying the Past: Legacy of the Mountain Meadows Massacre 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/s57qnmykAlUSakSJykPywkHqCDe.jpg This documentary by filmmaker Brian Patrick explores the history and legacy of one of the most brutal massacres in the history of the American west. It examine the relationship between the descendants of the besieged party to the modern day Mormon church, and whether healing is a possibility. Burying the Past: Legacy of the Mountain Meadows Massacre
